title: MoRUN Delete Files Permanently v3.5
description:
MoRUN Delete Files Permanently v3.5 Installer-2010kaiser
               ========================================================



                  N.B.: THIS INSTALLER MUST BE RAN AS ADMINISTRATOR
                  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Completely delete sensitive files from your computer,
removable disks, USB drives and memory sticks with
one click

Why you need Delete Files Permanently:
======================================

Your computer stores every file you have ever
When you delete files using standard methods, Windows
does not erase the content of these files - it only
deletes references to these files but the content of
all deleted files remains on the disk and all deleted
files from movies, pictures and music you downloaded
to your private documents, Internet history files and
emails can be easily recovered. Deleted files can be
restored even if you formatted your hard drive.

Delete Files Permanently enables you to permanently
delete sensitive files and wipe free space without
chance of recovery
Make it impossible for anyone to restore deleted
information and track your computer use!
Prevent business data, credit card information or
personal information from being recovered!
Save hard disk space and improve your computer's
performance!

Main Features:
==============

Permanently delete files and folders:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Delete Files Permanently allows you to permanently
delete files and folders without any possibility to
recover. You can use Delete Files Permanently to
delete files and folders by selecting them in the
program main window as well as by using the 'Delete
permanently' option integrated in the Windows Shell.
For more security Delete Files Permanently changes
files and folders names, files size and files date
(creation/last modify/last access) so it is
to find the original names, size and dates of deleted
files.

14 built-in wiping schemes:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Delete Files Permanently lets you easily, quickly and
permanently delete all personal, confidential and
critical data by overwriting it using different
schemes - so you can feel confident that sensitive
information is completely eliminated. You can use any
of 14 built-in wiping schemes or create and use your
own wiping schemes.

Wipe Free Space:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Using the Wipe Free Space you can permanently delete
previously 'deleted' files.

Empty and Wipe Recycle Bin:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Using Delete Files Permanently you can empty and
permanently delete Recycle Bin content to remove all
traces of previously deleted files.

Wiping scheme Viewer and Editor:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You can create and use your own wiping schemes or
create wiping schemes based on built-in algorithms to
meet your specific requirements. Integrated wiping
scheme Viewer/Editor helps you view, add and modify
wiping schemes in seconds.
Ability to use multiple byte patterns (up to 5) while
creating shredding algorithms
